 17 /**
 18  * Creates a new WebGL wrapper instance.
 19  *
 20  * @class WebGL wrapper for common {@link bigshot.VRPanorama} uses.
 21  * @param {HTMLCanvasElement} canvas_ the canvas
 22  * @see #onresize()
 23  */
 24 bigshot.WebGL = function (canvas_) {
 25     /**
 26      * The html canvas element we'll be rendering in.
 27      *
 28      * @type HTMLCanvasElement
 29      */
 30     this.canvas = canvas_;
 31     
 32     /**
 33      * Our WebGL context.
 34      *
 35      * @type WebGLRenderingContext
 36      */
 37     this.gl = bigshot.WebGLUtil.createContext (this.canvas); 
 38             
 39     /**
 40      * The current object-to-world transform matrix.
 41      *
 42      * @type bigshot.TransformStack
 43      */
 44     this.mvMatrix = new bigshot.TransformStack ();
 45     
 46     /**
 47      * The current perspective transform matrix.
 48      *
 49      * @type bigshot.TransformStack
 50      */
 51     this.pMatrix = new bigshot.TransformStack ();
 52     
 53     /**
 54      * The current shader program.
 55      */
 56     this.shaderProgram = null;
 57     
 58     this.onresize ();
 59 }
 60 
 61 bigshot.WebGL.prototype = {
 62     /**
 63      * Must be called when the canvas element is resized.
 64      *
 65      * @public
 66      */
 67     onresize : function () {
 68         this.gl.viewportWidth = this.canvas.width;
 69         this.gl.viewportHeight = this.canvas.height;
 70     },
 71     
 72     /**
 73      * Fragment shader. Taken from the "Learning WebGL" lessons:
 74      *     http://learningwebgl.com/blog/?p=571
 75      */
 76     fragmentShader : 
 77         "#ifdef GL_ES\n" + 
 78         "    precision highp float;\n" + 
 79         "#endif\n" + 
 80         "\n" + 
 81         "varying vec2 vTextureCoord;\n" + 
 82         "\n" + 
 83         "uniform sampler2D uSampler;\n" + 
 84         "\n" + 
 85         "void main(void) {\n" + 
 86         "    gl_FragColor = texture2D(uSampler, vec2(vTextureCoord.s, vTextureCoord.t));\n" + 
 87         "}\n",
 88     
 89     /**
 90      * Vertex shader. Taken from the "Learning WebGL" lessons:
 91      *     http://learningwebgl.com/blog/?p=571
 92      */
 93     vertexShader : 
 94         "attribute vec3 aVertexPosition;\n" +
 95         "attribute vec2 aTextureCoord;\n" +
 96         "\n" +
 97         "uniform mat4 uMVMatrix;\n" +
 98         "uniform mat4 uPMatrix;\n" +
 99         "\n" +
100         "varying vec2 vTextureCoord;\n" +
101         "\n" +
102         "void main(void) {\n" +
103         "    gl_Position = uPMatrix * uMVMatrix * vec4(aVertexPosition, 1.0);\n" +
104         "    vTextureCoord = aTextureCoord;\n" +
105         "}",
106     
107     /**
108      * Creates a new shader.
109      *
110      * @type WebGLShader
111      * @param {String} source the source code
112      * @param {int} type the shader type, one of WebGLRenderingContext.FRAGMENT_SHADER or 
113      * WebGLRenderingContext.VERTEX_SHADER
114      */
115     createShader : function (source, type) {
116         var shader = this.gl.createShader (type);
117         this.gl.shaderSource (shader, source);
118         this.gl.compileShader (shader);
119         
120         if (!this.gl.getShaderParameter (shader, this.gl.COMPILE_STATUS)) {
121             alert (this.gl.getShaderInfoLog (shader));
122             return null;
123         }
124         
125         return shader;
126     },
127     
128     /**
129      * Creates a new fragment shader.
130      *
131      * @type WebGLShader
132      * @param {String} source the source code
133      */
134     createFragmentShader : function (source) {
135         return this.createShader (source, this.gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER);
136     },
137     
138     /**
139      * Creates a new vertex shader.
140      *
141      * @type WebGLShader
142      * @param {String} source the source code
143      */
144     createVertexShader : function (source) {
145         return this.createShader (source, this.gl.VERTEX_SHADER);
146     },
147     
148     /**
149      * Initializes the shaders.
150      */
151     initShaders : function () {
152         this.shaderProgram = this.gl.createProgram ();
153         this.gl.attachShader (this.shaderProgram, this.createVertexShader (this.vertexShader));
154         this.gl.attachShader (this.shaderProgram, this.createFragmentShader (this.fragmentShader));
155         this.gl.linkProgram (this.shaderProgram);
156         
157         if (!this.gl.getProgramParameter (this.shaderProgram, this.gl.LINK_STATUS)) {
158             throw new Error ("Could not initialise shaders");
159             return;
160         }
161         
162         this.gl.useProgram (this.shaderProgram);
163         
164         this.shaderProgram.vertexPositionAttribute = this.gl.getAttribLocation (this.shaderProgram, "aVertexPosition");
165         this.gl.enableVertexAttribArray (this.shaderProgram.vertexPositionAttribute);
166         
167         this.shaderProgram.textureCoordAttribute = this.gl.getAttribLocation (this.shaderProgram, "aTextureCoord");
168         this.gl.enableVertexAttribArray (this.shaderProgram.textureCoordAttribute);
169         
170         this.shaderProgram.pMatrixUniform = this.gl.getUniformLocation(this.shaderProgram, "uPMatrix");
171         this.shaderProgram.mvMatrixUniform = this.gl.getUniformLocation(this.shaderProgram, "uMVMatrix");
172         this.shaderProgram.samplerUniform = this.gl.getUniformLocation(this.shaderProgram, "uSampler");
173     },
174 
175     
176     /**
177      * Sets the matrix parameters ("uniforms", since the variables are declared as uniform) in the shaders.
178      */
179     setMatrixUniforms : function () {
180         this.gl.uniformMatrix4fv (this.shaderProgram.pMatrixUniform, false, new Float32Array(this.pMatrix.matrix().flatten()));
181         this.gl.uniformMatrix4fv (this.shaderProgram.mvMatrixUniform, false, new Float32Array(this.mvMatrix.matrix().flatten()));
182     },
183     
184     /**
185      * Creates a texture from an image.
186      *
187      * @param {HTMLImageElement or HTMLCanvasElement} image the image
188      * @type WebGLTexture
189      * @return An initialized texture
190      */
191     createImageTextureFromImage : function (image, minFilter, magFilter) {
192         var texture = this.gl.createTexture();
193         this.handleImageTextureLoaded (this, texture, image, minFilter, magFilter);
194         return texture;
195     },
196     
197     /**
198      * Creates a texture from a source url.
199      *
200      * @param {String} source the URL of the image
201      * @return WebGLTexture
202      */
203     createImageTextureFromSource : function (source, minFilter, magFilter) {
204         var image = new Image();
205         var texture = this.gl.createTexture();
206         
207         var that = this;
208         image.onload = function () {
209             that.handleImageTextureLoaded (that, texture, image, minFilter, magFilter);
210         }
211         
212         image.src = source;
213         
214         return texture;
215     },
216     
217     /**
218      * Uploads the image data to the texture memory. Called when the texture image
219      * has finished loading.
220      *
221      * @private
222      */
223     handleImageTextureLoaded : function (that, texture, image, minFilter, magFilter) {
224         that.gl.bindTexture (that.gl.TEXTURE_2D, texture);        
225         that.gl.texImage2D (that.gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, that.gl.RGBA, that.gl.RGBA, that.gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, image);
226         that.gl.texParameteri (that.gl.TEXTURE_2D, that.gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, magFilter ? magFilter : that.gl.NEAREST);
227         that.gl.texParameteri (that.gl.TEXTURE_2D, that.gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, minFilter ? minFilter : that.gl.NEAREST);
228         that.gl.texParameteri (that.gl.TEXTURE_2D, that.gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_S, that.gl.CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
229         that.gl.texParameteri (that.gl.TEXTURE_2D, that.gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_T, that.gl.CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
230         if (minFilter == that.gl.NEAREST_MIPMAP_NEAREST
231                 || minFilter == that.gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST
232                     || minFilter == that.gl.NEAREST_MIPMAP_LINEAR
233                     || minFilter == that.gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR) {
234                         that.gl.generateMipmap(that.gl.TEXTURE_2D);
235                     }
236         
237         that.gl.bindTexture (that.gl.TEXTURE_2D, null);
238     },
239     
240     deleteTexture : function (texture) {
241         this.gl.deleteTexture (texture);
242     },
243     
244     dispose : function () {
245         delete this.canvas;
246         delete this.gl;
247     }
248 };
249
